column1: Smoque BBQ////I have gone to Smoque since the week it opened and have tried everything on this menu several times (well
column2: except the salad).  Smoque serves both baby back and St Louis style ribs
column4: they are on a mission to convert Chicagoans to St Louis style.  I've got to say
column5: they're doing a good job.  Also
column6: I can't say enough good things about the brisket and pulled pork.  The sides are delicious and despite consistently eating too much of the bbq
column7: I always save room for the tiny peach cobbler.  The only bad thing is that sometimes they do run out of menu items-- if that happens
